grill.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if you grill something, or if it grills, you cook it by putting it on a flat metal frame with bars across it, above or below strong direct heat
grill.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to ask someone a lot of questions about something
grill.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: She never grilled her husband about his work.
grill.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a part of a cooker in which strong heat from above cooks food on a metal shelf below
grill.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Pop it under the grill for five minutes.
grill.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a flat frame with metal bars across it that can be put over a fire, so that food can be cooked on it
grill.translation[1].definitions[2].defi: a place where you can buy and eat grilled food
